prompts.title: Update parcel type definition
prompts.system: You are a senior software engineer working on a React and TypeScript codebase. Your current task is to update type definitions in the project.

context.prdSummary: The RedX Admin Hub is a web application designed for administrative users of the RedX platform. Its primary purpose is to manage and oversee various operations related to parcel delivery services.
relevantRepoConventions: File Naming: Uses camelCase for files and PascalCase for components.
tokensOrConstraints: Do not use hex colors directly; use design tokens.
evidence: The parcel type needs to include the 'delivered_at' field to ensure type safety across the application.

instructions: Add 'delivered_at: string' to the Parcel interface in src/types/parcel.ts.
guardrails: DO NOT modify files outside this step's scope
DO NOT remove existing exports without checking consumers
deliverables: The 'delivered_at' field is present in the Parcel type definition in src/types/parcel.ts.

prompts.title: Modify parcel API to include 'delivered_at' field
prompts.system: You are a senior software engineer working on a React and TypeScript codebase. Your current task is to modify API services to include new data fields.

context.prdSummary: The RedX Admin Hub is a web application designed for administrative users of the RedX platform. Its primary purpose is to manage and oversee various operations related to parcel delivery services.
tokensOrConstraints: Do not use hex colors directly; use design tokens.
evidence: The API needs to provide the 'delivered_at' field to the frontend for display in the table.

instructions: Update the API call in src/services/parcelAPI.ts to include 'delivered_at' in the response.
guardrails: DO NOT modify files outside this step's scope
DO NOT remove existing exports without checking consumers
Use existing API client for HTTP requests
deliverables: The API response includes the 'delivered_at' field in src/services/parcelAPI.ts.

prompts.title: Add 'Delivered At' column to TableRenderer
prompts.system: You are a senior software engineer working on a React and TypeScript codebase. Your current task is to modify UI components to display new data fields.

context.prdSummary: The RedX Admin Hub is a web application designed for administrative users of the RedX platform. Its primary purpose is to manage and oversee various operations related to parcel delivery services.
relevantRepoConventions: Prefer Ant Design components for consistent UI patterns.
tokensOrConstraints: Do not use hex colors directly; use design tokens.
evidence: The TableRenderer component needs to display the new 'Delivered At' column for users.

instructions: Add a new column definition for 'Delivered At' in TableRenderer.
Ensure the column uses the format 'DD MMM YYYY, hh:mm A'.
Handle cases where 'delivered_at' is null by displaying 'Not Delivered'.
guardrails: DO NOT modify files outside this step's scope
DO NOT remove existing exports without checking consumers
Use Ant Design components for table rendering
deliverables: The 'Delivered At' column is visible in the table with correct formatting and fallback text in src/components/table/TableRenderer.tsx.

prompts.title: Update Parcels page to support new column
prompts.system: You are a senior software engineer working on a React and TypeScript codebase. Your current task is to update page components to integrate modified UI components.

context.prdSummary: The RedX Admin Hub is a web application designed for administrative users of the RedX platform. Its primary purpose is to manage and oversee various operations related to parcel delivery services.
relevantRepoConventions: Pages should wrap route content with Authorize where access control is required.
tokensOrConstraints: Do not use hex colors directly; use design tokens.
evidence: The Parcels page needs to be updated to correctly display the new 'Delivered At' column.

instructions: Ensure the Parcels page passes the correct data to TableRenderer.
Verify sorting and filtering functionality works with the new column.
guardrails: DO NOT modify files outside this step's scope
DO NOT remove existing exports without checking consumers
deliverables: The Parcels page displays the 'Delivered At' column with sorting and filtering working as expected in src/pages/Parcels.tsx.

prompts.title: Add tests for 'Delivered At' column functionality
prompts.system: You are a senior software engineer working on a React and TypeScript codebase. Your current task is to write tests to ensure new UI functionality works as expected.

context.prdSummary: The RedX Admin Hub is a web application designed for administrative users of the RedX platform. Its primary purpose is to manage and oversee various operations related to parcel delivery services.
tokensOrConstraints: Do not use hex colors directly; use design tokens.
evidence: Tests are needed to ensure the new column behaves correctly and does not break existing functionality.

instructions: Add test cases to check the display of 'Delivered At' values.
Test the sorting and filtering functionality for the new column.
Verify the fallback text 'Not Delivered' is displayed when 'delivered_at' is null.
guardrails: DO NOT modify files outside this step's scope
DO NOT remove existing exports without checking consumers
deliverables: All tests for the 'Delivered At' column pass successfully in src/test/example.test.ts.
